title: Find Your LD
description: Find your Legislative District and volunteer.
report: Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Be the Blue Wave
description: Be part of the Neighbor to Neighbor Program.
report: Click on the link above! This short training program will give you the skills and tools you need to reach out to Democrats and Independents in your neighborhood. The process and message are clear. You just need to remind them to vote.

title: Voter Registration
report: Contact the Maricopa County Democratic Party at https://www.maricopadems.org/ or (602)-298-0503 for volunteer opportunities. Click on the link or phone icon above. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Sinema
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Kyrsten Sinema. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Support Malik
report: We need to support Anita Malik because she is smart, well-spoken and brings a business focus that is attractive to voters in CD 6. Let's send a Democrat to Congress! Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Canvass,Text,Phone
report: All Legislative Districts need our help NOW. Join LD28 on Oct 4 at 5:30pm, Oct 6 at 8:30am, Oct 8 at 4-7pm. Meet at the LD28 office at 10401 N 32nd St, PHX. OR, click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Marsh
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to the AZ Senate when we help to elect Christene Marsh. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Support Butler
report: We must send Kelli Butler back to the AZ House of Representatives. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Join AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Every seat in the State Legislature is up for election and Democrats are just three seats away from taking back control of the State Senate.

title: Text for Democrats
description: Only 16 days to text out the Vote.
report: Join our text team to talk to voters across the country about what's at stake in this election. Texting is quick, easy, and effective! The best part? You can participate from anywhere -- your home, a coffee shop, or with friends. Click on the link and sign up today, and we'll send you everything you need to start texting.

title: #VotingSquad
description: Help our friends and neighbors to vote.
report: The #VotingSquad initiative encourages people to put together a five-person “squad” that will encourage everyone in the group to vote by Nov. 6. As the leader of the squad, it’s up to you to make sure these people are ready to vote. Challenge 3 - 5 others to form their own voting squads. Click on the link above and get started.

title: Vote! Vote! Vote!
report: If you haven’t yet cast a ballot, get out and do it NOW. Help your family, friends and neighbors do the same. Help a stranger. Vote as if the future of our country depends on it. Because it does.

title: Make Every Vote Count
description: Help with the Florida recount efforts.
report: If you live in or near Florida, your support is needed! Don’t live nearby? Forward this to someone you know in Florida or a surrounding state, or share on Facebook or Twitter. What: Help with the Florida recount efforts; Where: Across Florida; When: 11/14 through 11/19. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time.

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2018 and 2020. Open the App and you will have your idea for the week. And, the ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
